resources.string: Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a new virus. \n\nThe disease causes respiratory illness (like the flu) with symptoms such as a cough, fever, and in more severe cases, difficulty breathing. You can protect yourself by washing your hands frequently, avoiding touching your face, and avoiding close contact (1 meter or 3 feet) with people who are unwell
This is not Government app and we are not associated with the Government.
